phrases: It is my recommended souvenirs list!
Ganso, Honke, or Honten would be accepted!
Remember to get enough for Mom, too!
And the much-anticipated number one is...
1 will be revealed after the commercial 2 Oil blotting paper 3 Raw yatsuhashi
1 will be revealed after the commercial
The number one souvenir would be...
You are not even in my class.
My Teen Romantic Comedy SNAFU TOO!
The Most Terrifying Haunted House in History
I just heard a weird voice!
I cannot handle stuff like this...
Ghosts in haunted houses are not scary.
What is really scary are people.
There is that cynical attitude again...
I find it kind of reliable, though.
What I mean is, haunted houses
where people scare you are the most terrifying.
Hey, Totsuka, you seem totally cool with this.
Yeah, I like this sort of thing.
The Most Terrifying Haunted House in History
Well, I think we have played enough.
I wonder if the haunted house had any effect...
This garden is also called Tiger Cubs Crossing the Water, you know.
Which parts do you think are the tigers?
Did that interest her because tigers are cats?
She loves cats like they love Friskies.
We do not want to push too hard and make Ebina-san like him less.
There is one person who cannot catch a clue.
I am sorry to leave this all to you.
It is no substitute for actual help,
but I have been thinking about this.
Famous places in Kyoto that girls might like.
I thought it might help them.
You are always on the ball, Yukinon!
All right, I am heading back now.
Listen, what exactly are you guys up to?
Could you stop trying to mess with Ebina?
And we are not messing with her.
That is a nuisance, you know.
There is someone who is asking us to do it, though.
Besides, it is not like it hurts you or anything.
It is about to hurt me.
If you are with Yui, you should know about Ebina.
What did you think I meant?
As if Yui would go out with you.
Coordinate casually with a girly knit sweater
That is not what I meant.
I meant, if you talk with Yui a lot, you should know.
You did not have to add that on a second time...
Ebina appeals to guys as long as she is not talking,
so a lot of them ask to be introduced to her.
But once they are introduced, she turns them down really gently.
I thought she was being shy,
so I tried pretty hard to push things along.
As if I were a total stranger.
Ebina does not talk about herself much, and I do not ask,
but I do not think she likes that kind of thing.
If you had to sacrifice many things to protect one,
you are more likely to give up and throw it away.
Including the relationships you have in your hand now.
I am having a lot of fun right now.
So I would appreciate it if you did not butt in.
You do not have to worry, then.
Hayama said he would do something about it.
Well, if Hayato said that, then it is fine.
Hikitani-kun, you have not forgotten what we discussed, have you?
How is it going among the men?
They are getting along fine, I guess.
They play cards together at night.
That is not tasty at all!
What I really want is for the guys to be
all close together where I can see them!
Well, we are going to Arashiyama, too, so maybe then...
You are going to spoil your dinner.
Then you can have it, Hikki.
Why does she just take one little bite from each thing?
If we were splitting them half-and-half, I would eat it.
What do I do with these, Yukinon?
Well, I can eat some, I guess...
I sort of feel like an animal being fed.
Food I did not have to work for tastes awesome.
I bet this is the place!
It does look like a good location.
If Tobe's going to go for it,
I guess this is the place.
You probably will not want to hang out with me anymore...
I am kind of freaking out right now.
I was just going to say good luck,
but once I saw your face, I did not feel like it anymore.
I feel a little less nervous, though...
In fact, it felt as if you were trying to interfere.
I just like things as they are now.
I like Tobe and Hina, and the time we all spend together.
If this is enough to ruin that, was it really that strong to begin with?
What is lost will not ever come back.
It is more ridiculous that you are
trying to enjoy superficial relationships like that.
I do not think of it as superficial.
Right now, the environment I am in is everything to me.
I told him over and over to give up.
I cannot see Hina opening her heart to him right now.
But still, I do not know what is in the future.
So I did not want Tobe to rush to a conclusion...
That is just for your own convenience.
What I would do does not matter.
If it were me... is a waste of time.
How I think or feel means nothing whatsoever,
and it is pointless to talk about.
So in other words, you do not want anything to change.
You are the last person I wanted to turn to.
I do not understand what Hayama's trying to protect.
And I do not need to.
That is why there is something I can do.
I am totally freaking out right now!
Listen, what will you do if she rejects you?
Is not it kind of harsh to say that before I tell her?
Just hurry up and answer me.
I still would not give up!
I am not a very serious person, you know?
But I am pretty serious about this!
Then do the best you can, until the very end.
You are a good guy after all, Hikitani-kun!
So you can be nice, Hikki.
It is nothing like that, seriously.
At the rate it is going, Tobe will be rejected.
For what it is worth, there is a way to wrap this all up neatly.
Well, I will leave this to you.
For starters, there is no doubt she will turn him down.
Tobe must be somewhat prepared for that.
Tobe is not the only one who values their relationships.
That is why she came to us with that request.
And that is why he suffered so much.
He does not want to lose it.
He wants to keep it in his hand.
There is one thing all three of them want.
To not see Tobe get rejected,
and to keep their group close while staying good friends with Ebina-san.
Then there is really only one way!
I have liked you for a long time.
I do not intend to go out with anyone right now.
No matter who tells me they like me, I will not go out with them.
If that is all you wanted, I am going now.
Hikitani-kun, that was not cool, man.
I mean, I am glad I found out before she could reject me,
That just means this is not the time, right?
What is wrong with enjoying the friendship you have now?
Sorry, but I will not let you win!
I knew that was the only way you knew how to do things.
I do not want your apology.
I hate the way you do things.
It frustrates me that I cannot explain why, but...
I really hate that you handle things that way.
and Hina did not get to say what she wanted to either, but...
For a second, I thought you were serious.
Do not do stuff like that again, okay?
It was the most effective way.
I am not talking about effectiveness.
There are some people who do not want a solution.
Some want things to stay the way they are.
There is no way to make things convenient for everyone.
And as I am saying all this, it hits me.
So the only option is to find a compromise.
This is the kind of deception I hated more than anything in the world.
and the guys seem to be getting along well.
Hina did not have to worry, either.
Now things will be back to normal from tomorrow on.
Maybe nothing will have to change.
You should give more thought to how other people feel!
How is it you understand so much, but you do not understand that?
You do not have to thank me.
I did not resolve the thing you consulted me about.
You wanted me to get the guys closer
so you could keep them at a distance from yourself,
Tobe from confessing to you before it happened.
You probably talked to Hayama about this, too.
became stressed and had no choice but to act the way he did.
Tobe's an idiot and a loser, but he is a nice guy, I think.
Even if I hooked up with someone right now, it would not work out.
I guess there is no helping that, then.
Maybe I would be able to go out with you, Hikitani-kun.
Do not even joke about that.
If you say stuff carelessly, someone might fall in love with you.
I sort of like the way you can be so honest with people
who do not matter to you.
I sort of like that about myself, too.
Hey, I can appreciate a person who can say things
he does not mean so easily.
You know, I like myself and everything around me right now.
I have not felt like that in ages, so I do not want to lose it.
I like where I am, and I like the people here with me.
Because it is precious, because you do not want to lose it,
you hide it away and put up a front.
His and Her Love Confessions Will Reach No One.
03 Quietly, Yukinoshita Yukino Makes a Decision.
Sure is quiet without Onii-chan around.
I hope Onii-chan's getting along okay.
It is so boring without Onii-chan around.
I hope he comes home soon.
